channel.title: [Coding] Need little help [PI 317]

item.title: [Coding] Need little help [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:470055”] case 12721: if (c.staffPoints == 5) { sendMessage("You currently have too much Staff Points!"); } else if (c.staffPoints < 5 ) { c.lvlPoints +=50; c.staffPoints +=1; } break;

I’d suggest reading up on java syntax.

c.staffPoints == <5

Is not valid. You also did not form the else statement properly, and your break statement was not in the right spot.[/quote]

Thank you sir,

Read full topic

item.title: [Coding] Need little help [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

case 12721:
    if (c.staffPoints == 5) {
        sendMessage("You currently have too much Staff Points!");
    }
    else if (c.staffPoints < 5 ) {
        c.lvlPoints +=50;
        c.staffPoints +=1;
    }
    break;

I’d suggest reading up on java syntax.

c.staffPoints == <5

Is not valid. You also did not form the else statement properly, and your break statement was not in the right spot.

Read full topic

item.title: [Coding] Need little help [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

Hello guys,

i can’t find a solution for my code… I’ve added Staff Points so Staff won’t spawn too much stuff,
if a staff clicks an object it gives them an item or points, but i let them spawn only 5 times…
Here’s the code:

case 12721:
		if (c.staffPoints == 5) {
				sendMessage("You currently have too much Staff Points!");
			else if (c.staffPoints == <5 );
					c.lvlPoints +=50;
					c.staffPoints +=1;
			break;
		}

Please help me,

Read full topic
